content.html:
• Inspiring week. I have learned that escape rooms can be brilliant, and that you can survive without a smart phone.
  • I swear I’m going to uninstall Ableton at this point.
  • Went on a little mission to hand-deliver a copy of my mum’s book to someone, and the experience has taught me that that I could never be a courier.
  • No matter how much Grey’s Anatomy I watch, there seems to be so much more.
  • Made some chocolate, sort-of.
  • Towards the weekend I went with a friend on a little city-break to Berlin (the long way) to eat döner, drink Club Mate and to finally cross Liquidrom and Vabali off my list.
  • Going from 0-60 with sauna has been interesting, and I’m sure I’ll come to regret it, but for now I’ve decided that I’m a proper convert. There’s no time to be anxious in the heat.
  • Experienced my first ever Berlin club rejection, which was bound to eventually happen. At least we only queued for 20 minutes. Went to a place nearby, where the staff at the door were almost excited to see us and let us in immediately.
